Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Right after breakfast, I see Chrome waiting outside the door.'}
{2: 'Chrome.', 3: '6', 4: 'Have you been waiting long?', 5: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Good morning, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'No, I just got here too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You need something?', 3: '9'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Commandant, I have a favor to ask.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's a bit of a hassle. If you don't like it, just say no and I'll leave you alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Anything for you.', 3: '12', 4: "Let's hear it.", 5: '15'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Uh, maybe you should think about it first?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I didn't even say what the favor was. You could be walking into a trap.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But you won't set traps for me, will you?", 3: '16', 4: 'Then tell me what the favor is.', 5: '15'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Here's the thing. Kamui hopes that you and Gray Raven will join Strike Hawk in planning a play for the anniversary.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I know how you feel about this. If you don't want to do this, I totally understand.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "If you'll excuse me...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I didn't say no, did I?", 3: '21', 4: "You don't sound excited about my joining at all!", 5: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "So are you saying you're willing to help?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "...It's just that you're busy as it is with work, so I hate to put more on your plate.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Although for me personally, the whole anniversary thing is a welcome diversion from work. It's also a reward I promised my team members for doing well in recent missions.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And whether you help or not, I intend to keep my promise.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "So don't feel any pressure to say yes. This is just me asking you for a personal favor.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Kamui is a social butterfly, but I'm not good at organizing social activities. That's probably why he enjoys being around Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Gray Raven is an amazing team. As their leader, you have a lot to teach me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "And... as your friend, I'd like to invite you to this event.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I want to hear your genuine answer.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "If you and your team are interested, I'll be more than happy to sign you up for the event.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Oh yeah? That's great.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Thank you. I owe you one.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm just glad you came to me.", 3: '36', 4: "It's alright.", 5: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're the only one in Babylonia I can turn to for this kind of thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll take that as a compliment.", 3: '38', 4: 'My... pleasure?', 5: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Please be sure to run this by the other Gray Raven members.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Let's meet this time tomorrow, shall we?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I should get going.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Commandant, you've got a... there, the right side of your collar. It's folded in on itself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh, thank you.', 3: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Sorry, I'm off then.", 4: '1'}
